Since LN traffic is private and highly situational you cannot extrapolate network traffic from a node's capacity. I see ~100 tx/day on my nodes with 25 BTC total capacity. lnbig reports ~250 tx/day with 500 BTC total capacity. Same network, 20x more capacity, 2x more transactions
